website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a solid-built hall tree with lots of space, seating, and attractive styling, don't let the known quality control issues or price stop you from considering this nice piece.
pros: Stands out for its beautiful all-wood look with walnut finish
We love the split-seat bench that doubles as a storage unit
cons: Some pre-drilled holes don't line up, posing difficulties during assembly
Some trees arrive with missing pieces and bent hinges

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: Product is really cheap looking and built really bad. holes are not lining up. One of the storage door was separated from hinge and screw was not holding the door any more when i open the box. Since Linon Home put on the user manual "Contact customer service before you return it", i sent an email to them about the defect. it has been almost 2 weeks and no respond yet. Don't waste your time and money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Savas Arslan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Piece, but Buy Through Prime!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I bought through Prime! The first box came with one piece with missing inserts (to hold one base side with another. I tried calling the manufacturer many times, but no one would answer the phone, nor respond to multiple voice messages. I contacted Amazon for a return and repurchase. All went seamlessly. The new unit arrived with all parts functional. I assembled it alone (with the assist of a few throw pillows for support) in about an hour. Because the bottom of the storage is a bit flimsy, I took some leftover hardwood flooring to made a stronger bottom and slid it into place. Looks great in my entryway with the shoe storage I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E.

customer_reviews.title: Great and functional hall tree
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about this based on some of the reviews about assembly. So we took our time and it was well worth it. One point of the assembly requires to large pieces to be assembled at a right angle. It's obvious that one of the sides needs to be supported to avoid splitting the wood. Take your time and think about what you're doing and you'll be pleased with the results. The finished product looks great and has instantly solved where to put our guests hats and coats when we entertain. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, simple tools required, no more than 45 minuets. Packing could have been better, arrived with pieces with gouges and finish rubbed off at some spots. For the price, nice investment. Got 3 pairs of work boots, 2 pairs sneakers and room for more in the bench. I usually have a hoody and a jacket hanging from the hooks at all times, and have placed nick-nacks on the top shelf, sturdy and eye catching piece.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: set up easy, feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: set up easy, feels sturdy. It's designed to be anchored to the wall to help keep it from tipping, but I didn't want to drill any holes in my landlord's walls, and this thing is holding up several coats and backpacks just fine and isn't giving the slightest hint of tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great color and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in the area I wanted it for. I saw mixed reviews regarding the assembly of it. Some said a couple hours, and someone said something like 6 hours. My husband does all the assembling and had it assembled within an hour and a half. It must have been fairly easy to put together because he didn’t ask for my assistance and I didn’t hear any cussing. It seems to be pretty well made and the color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Driggers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the money 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for one of thees for awhile. Typically purchasing one online tends to be of cheaper quality. NOT THIS ONE!!!!!!! I was very , very pleased on the quality and ease of assembly of this product. For the $160.00 I spent I feel I got the quality of a $300.00 plus piece of furniture. The only thing I needed to add was some wood glue. Was happy top purchase a bottle of glue. (I Should have had one anyway). I would highly recommend this to anyone who want's a good value on an awesome hall tree piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Bauder

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these for our nice wide hall in our old southern home for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our nice wide hall in our old southern home for the kids to use for their school things. I don't let them put their backpacks on the hooks because I do not believe it can support the weight, but it is ok for jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Gump

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and exactly how I imagined it would be. It looks great next to my front door. I keep our throw blankets in the bottom, so they're easy to grab when we want one. The space in the bottom is bigger than I thought it would be, which is great. Assembly was pretty easy, my husband and I knocked it out fairly quickly. There was two bolts that connect the top to the bottom, that due to their location, made it a booger to put in. Overall, extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Small parts were separated in four bags depending on purpose. Instructions were graphic and easy to follow. A few of the predrilled holes were not quite aligned but this caused only a slight problem in assembly. The small allen wrench was ok, but I found that a ratcheting screwdriver with an allen head made assembly quicker. Fit and finish are very good especially for the price. I noticed a couple of small spots where the veneer was chipped but these were on the back and top where they are not noticeable. Assembled, it makes a sturdy hall tree that should withstand normal use well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Minor issues but great
customer_reviews.text: I had minor issues with the holes but I was able to find a way to put it all together. Still sturdy and looks great in our mudroom
customer_reviews.author: Acevenary

customer_reviews.title: This piece is really easy to put together I couldn't do it by myself ...
customer_reviews.text: I would HIGHLY recommend buying. This piece is really easy to put together I couldn't do it by myself I found it really hard to do it myself cause you need someone to hold pieces for you. Otherwise with two people it a piece of cake! NO damage looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build but missing parts and poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: A few areas were poorly constructed and it came missing all the hooks. Color is on orange side not brown. Yes, it's real wood but not good quality wood.Very simple to build so disregard any review that states otherwise. Follow the pictures. 4 stars lost due to no hooks in box and two of the wood pieces were off center when constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but disappointed with something’s
customer_reviews.text: Good piece but disappointed when I found some hardware defected. Ie: nail/ screw head with no nail. Part of the wood was chipped. Guess I know why this piece was discounted.
customer_reviews.author: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We’re pleased with it!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality for the price. Detailed instructions were helpful in assembly. Sturdy when assembled and we find it very functional for our hats and umbrellas. I’m 200 lbs and could sit with no concerns. Sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: JJRider

customer_reviews.title: Not good ! Safely avoid
customer_reviews.text: 1. No set up manual ! Had to check online which had different screw types ! Somehow had to use some common sense. 2. The parts don’t fasten well creating gaps and bends in the wood 3. Looks ok and not very tall ! Check the height adaption for your room
customer_reviews.author: YE Siva

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect in the spot where we needed it. I ended up taking a few little brackets and screwing the 2 doors together underneath. Making it 1 door instead. I like it better that way. There’s plenty of room to hang up coats or sweatshirts. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: comet23

customer_reviews.title: Looks as shown and sturdy for a bench
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It came un-damaged and easy to assemble. Lovely cherry color. Holds lots of stuff inside. The inside is just a paperboard material in the bottom, so I opted to put winter gloves and a couple pairs of boots. Good to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rocamontes

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok for what it cost. Directions were pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok for what it cost. Directions were pictures rather than step by step which I didn't care for. The hinges were loosly put into the bench seat, as I tightened them I found that the screws had been pulled out at some point at manufacturing or shipping and now I have to figure out an alternative plan to use that side of he bench. All and all- I'm not thrilled with the product but easier to keep it than deal with the hassle of disassembling and sending back
customer_reviews.author: Danni0875

customer_reviews.title: Even better than price suggests!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much nicer than I expected for the price. Really solid and beautiful. Sturdy enough for person over 200 lbs. Hooks are strong too. The bottom of the bench is not solid wood but still I have it full of shoes and it seems plenty strong. If you needed it to store something heavier you could always just slide a piece of wood in there. The shelf is perfect for a couple picture frames. This is the perfect piece of furniture for my entry way. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Very fine for my needs. Here on time.No trouble assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in my new home. The dog gear fits in the bench storage. The jackets are just where they are needed. Tidy, easily assembled. However, recommended to have a second pair of eyes and hands to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ... to put together but once together has been a great collector of kid stuff
customer_reviews.text: A little challenging to put together but once together has been a great collector of kid stuff! The storage under the bench could be stronger (my daughters backpack is too heave to be stored there)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this entryway storage bench. I have it in the hallway coming in from the garage and it is a perfect drop off bench. It has plenty of hooks for the kids jackets and I hang up their backpacks there too. The storage in the bench i surprisingly very roomy. It is perfect for anything really, I have all of our winter hats/gloves in there. You could also put a few baskets on the top shelf if you needed extra storage, it is not too tall. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hristina

customer_reviews.title: Great entry bench
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bench for my tiny entryway, it holds all our hats and scarves for easy access in the bench storage as the cold weather approaches and is even holding my dog's leash and car harness. I love the low profile spot to sit and put on shoes without taking up tons of space or looking bulky. The assembly went faster with two people, and the instructions were clear and easy to follow. The hinges on the bench work great and the whole thing feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and looks nice. Sturdy construction and lots of storage. We use the hooks for the kids backpacks and the bins for shoes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AAouate

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful safety.
customer_reviews.text: Sits at the top of our stairs blocking a low bannister on the third floor, but it still allows one to see below and light to filter upstairs. We bought this because we were afraid of someone taking a tumble over that bannister, but it really looks lovely sitting at the top of the stairs, and the bench and coat hooks provide nice storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Black

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, lots of parts, but still pretty easy to assemble. Sturdy, and worth what you are paying. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Watch for mismatched pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Took over an hour to put together and one of hatches pre-drilled holes were on the wrong side. So I had to drill a set of holes for the hinges, who’s was a bit of hassle. It’s a little small, but looks nice and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Stark1

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Fits where I needed it and helps with extra storage and keeping clutter down!
customer_reviews.author: DogLover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Was not terrible to put together, the hinges were hard though. It is perfect where it is but I didn’t realize how short it was. Great quality and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I was actually pretty impressed with this thing. Most flat pack furniture feels a little cheap and unstable, but this is great. I feel confident that I won't break it by sitting on it to put on my shoes, plus it looks nice. It's large enough to be useful but not so big that it overwhelms my tiny apartment. It was exactly what I was looking for. :)
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good item for the money. It was pretty easy to assemble . Not the best directions but not hard to put together
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving this three stars for durability and function ability ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this three stars for durability and function ability. As far as the color....I was looking for a deep walnut color as stated. It's not! It's a cherry stain on a light wood. I wish I had gone with black. Unfortunately my father in law already had it together when I got home and I couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Triplets

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: Quick to assemble and very well made. Beautiful wood. Very happy. Arrived in perfect condition . No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: DDD

customer_reviews.title: So glad I paid a little extra for high quality
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and perfect for the space. Was not hard to follow instructions. It probably took me two-ish hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. We needed a place to store our jackets along with bags from the day. This worked out perfectly in keeping everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: AHN

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged in more than a few spots. One of the ends didn't have the holes predrilled so I had to drill them out myself. Most of the holes didn't align well and I had to make it work. If you're looking for a hall tree that will last awhile, spend an extra $100 and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Hall Tree
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. All wood product. Assembly was step by step follow the directions. If you are a do it yourself type of person you will not have any problem with this. Great looking Hall Tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great little hall tree
customer_reviews.text: Great little entry hall tree. Easy to build and looks great. Packaged well and no damage from shipping. Slightly smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this hall tree twice. The first one was damaged and could not be assembled so we returned it and ordered a new one. The second was also damaged. It looked like the company (or someone) tried to glue it back together when it came apart in some places. VERY CHEAPLY MADE. POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Tart

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice piece, however I wished I had known part ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice piece, however I wished I had known part of it was partical board because it seemed to dent easy while trying to assemble. Other than that it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Hinges are a joke!
customer_reviews.text: So the hinges we received ripped the lid, they do not work! We followed the instructions and now we have a destroyed hall tree.
customer_reviews.author: kaltase2

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful....the only complaint I would have, the pre drilled holes were off, so where the hooks are, I have one that the top hook sits at 2 o'clock, instead of 12 o'clock like the others....I am OCD, so I keep this one covered with a jacket at all times. It was also missing one of the wooded peg covers, so I have an exposed screw (I keep this covered as well).....
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hassett

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. I am a girl and I did it by myself. A few of the screws didn't fit properly but overall I think I am happy with it. It looks nice and works in the space I have.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed by our garage entry to hang up costs, hats & keys. Like the storage bench too. Also it didn't cover up our light switch.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sherrard

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is great. We had another bench that we were trying to replace as the other one was old and pine color. This bench was perfect with color and fits the area great!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Frisby

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture as described. Looks great in our living room. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Matches the wood in my house and love the mission style. Was a little tricky for me to put together, but did it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great buy... this hall tree is so nice. It's better than I expected. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Hard strong wood, once assemled...
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality wood, but disappointed with the workmanship. Spray on wood is inconsistent, drilled holes are too deep, thereby causing assembly challenges. Otherwise, a very sound product...
customer_reviews.author: Lewislr

customer_reviews.title: Best piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great piec.. great value for the price. Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Judip

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This unit was extremely easy to put together. It took about one hour and 15 minutes. If you use power tools, be sure to use low torque settings! Excellent product. See video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Solid product and decently easy to assemble. I just wish they provided screw head covers for the upper screws like they did for the lower bench scews. It would have given it a more finished look. It arrived in great shape no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with the money I spend and the product I ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of the holes did not match up for putting together the piece. I am disappointed with the money I spend and the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and clear easy to follow directions on assembly. Nice and sturdy furniture
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gordy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s perfect! Was shocked that for it being on the smaller side it Holds a lot of jackets and probably 12+ pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara 🌻

customer_reviews.title: Great looking furniture
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the quality. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Plenty of room for shoes under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: 4x4jeepguy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Hall Tree
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled my Hall Tree was flawless and looks great. I highly recommend having an assistant during assembly to hold the structure in place while setting the bolts to avoid torqueing the wood or joints. Good quality. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This quality is outstanding. The cubby hole I put ...
customer_reviews.text: This quality is outstanding. The cubby hole I put this is was 1/2 inch too small so I had to cut it to size. This thing is made of real wood trust me! It looks rich.
customer_reviews.author: C Dutley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband to hang his hunting clothes on when he came through the door. It has worked great! The assembly was a little tricky, but the sturdiness is very good. Pretty piece right inside the door.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has held up through an entire winter of heavy coats hanging on it, and is still standing proud!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was easy to put togeather
customer_reviews.text: built better than expected . except doors on seat did not line up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love my hall tree! It was easy to assemble and it not only serves its purpose (keeping coats and jackets off the back of my furniture and shoes out of the entrance), it is a lovely piece that adds to my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: put it together and it looks so nice. works great for all my kids backpacks and ...
customer_reviews.text: put it together and it looks so nice. works great for all my kids backpacks and my purse. Bottom storage compartments i use for shoe storage.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids items, not so great bottom of chest
customer_reviews.text: It works great for our family of six, just wish there was a better bottom to the chest. My husband installed a support board because the one it came with kept popping out
customer_reviews.author: Amber K. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Hall Tree
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Hall tree. Its actually prettier in person. I love the fact that u can add decorations or seasonal decor on the top. I anchored it to the wall as i have little kids. They love putting their shoes inside and i love that guests cant see it! Worth the price for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and function
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Exactly as pictured. Functional. Wish it was one foot taller but I knew how tall it was before purchasing. The storage seat is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love this. My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My wife loves it. So easy to assemble. Looks awesome in our mud room. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: It is solid wood, and very pretty sitting by the door. Has gotten a lot of use already.
customer_reviews.text: We use it at the entryway, the screws for the hinges are to small and came stripped, had to put in longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: mary h chase

customer_reviews.title: Clutter saver
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed and super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This item is much more sturdy and attractive than I expected. Overall, this is a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and extremely well made! Very sturdy wood! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Staci D

customer_reviews.title: Decent item
customer_reviews.text: Price is great. Item looks great, not too hard to assemble. A week after use one of the hinges came out of place and the particular board where the screws were started to crumble a bit. We used wood glue and recrewed it back in place. Has been fine since.
customer_reviews.author: KaK

customer_reviews.title: Good piece for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too hard to put together. The back is a little flimsy but could be attached to a wall. Otherwise pretty well-built for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Bench
customer_reviews.text: Smaller area for shoes then what I thought. Nice bench anyways.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad i didnt let any negative reviews keep me from buying this hall tree.. I suppose there is always the occasional 'lemon'. I couldnt be happier with my purchase! It looks Great! And at an affordable price
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Was in perfect condition when it arrived and assembled easily in about a half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Slato

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I finally assemble this item and I love it. Nice and real wood
customer_reviews.author: All about the truth

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very functional storage next to the door
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have someplace to sit down and hang coats next the door to the garage. Storage in the seat is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product!! It was exactly what I wanted and fits perfect in my entry way. Overall just love it. It took a little bit to put it together for one person, but not awful. The description was right on.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Highly recommend buying this! Easy to put together. If you get a little confused, go to YouTube and check out the video. It is helpful. Great looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Pieces do not match at all for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Non of the holes align on the top section and half of the bench. There is no way for this to be assembled without splitting the wood. There was also a hold on the front of the bench that should have been on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son, and he loves it. Looks great and love the small top shelf for trinkets.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Pooler

customer_reviews.title: but nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: So-so quality, but nice for the price. Arrived slightly dinged up on some edges, and a pain to put together by myself. But overall I would recommend; looks very nice once finished.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith W

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: just okay, not exactly what I wanted but too much trouble to send back.
customer_reviews.author: texas star

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it 4 stars but the screw holes didn't line up and o e of the hinges were bent on the seat/lid. Fixed the hinge....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early. Easy to assemble. Looks great in my hallway. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece of furniture. It is well made and it wasn't too difficult to put together. I am actually looking at the bench to purchase next.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Roberts

customer_reviews.title: 2 left sides not happy
customer_reviews.text: Sent me 2left sides had to drill holes to make work
customer_reviews.author: tim minach

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Pegs to cover serws don't fit tight. Only 4. It does not take away from the item. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chantaye Painter

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Very time consuming if you're putting it together by yourself and two of the screws are very hard to get to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Decent looking piece of furniture. Assembly was simple, directions good.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: You get what  you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I had hoped. I will have to nail it to the wall just to keep it from falling down
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very easy to put together! Make sure you read the dimensions, because it does seem a little short (but I was expecting this).
customer_reviews.author: JEF

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with all pieces but I improvised so wasn’t to bad short a few dowel rods
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Fortner

customer_reviews.title: replacement part
customer_reviews.text: A part came damaged, e-mailed for new one and it came damaged worst than the first. Poor packing on replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to put it together rather quickly and said it was pretty easy, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: MissJeanna

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this! Very sturdy, lots of storage space. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before, but had to for this product. I absolutely LOVE it! Great quality and easy to assemble. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A decent piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews, description, and overall price got what I expected. I am pleased
